description.value:
Special: Flame, Toxic, Spray

Note: Extremely Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement, may not be acquirable elsewhere. Does 1d10 I (Toxic) damage instead of normal flame damage. Gains +2 PEN per DoF vs targets that fail agility test to avoid being set on fire. If implanted into a monstrosity, doesn't need to reload, but they take 1d5 I damage (not reduced by armour/toughness) every time they fire.
